# importFromDeviceIdentifier

**Type Property**

The identifier for a Continuity Camera menu item, which takes pictures or scans documents using an iOS device.

## Declaration

```swift
class let importFromDeviceIdentifier: NSUserInterfaceItemIdentifier
```

## Discussion

Use this string to locate the standard menu item that supports the Continuity Camera feature. The menu item stores this value in its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceItemIdentification/identifier] property.
title: importFromDeviceIdentifier
